meanings.definition: The act, process, or method of transmitting data over a computer network in a continuous flow.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching movies through streaming on my computer.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer streaming music online rather than downloading it.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the streaming light coming through the window.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed like a streaming river, never stopping.
meanings.sent5: The streaming of information from the internet was overwhelming.

meanings.definition: A method of watching or listening to video or audio content in real time over the internet without downloading the files.
meanings.sent1: We had a streaming session last night and watched a new series.
meanings.sent2: Do you use any streaming services to watch your favorite shows?
meanings.sent3: The streaming of the live concert made me feel like I was there.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a streaming melody.
meanings.sent5: The streaming of the news kept everyone informed instantly.
